title: Research
text:
My research bridges plant physiology, soil ecology, and molecular biology to understand:

Climate-driven stress responses in crops
Soil health under regenerative management
Plant–microbe interactions
Omics-driven ecosystem modeling

title: Pawan Devkota
text:
Plant Physiology • Soil Ecology • Molecular Approaches
Welcome to my research website.
My research integrates plant physiological measurements, soil biogeochemistry, and high-dimensional omics approaches to understand ecosystem function under abiotic stress and regenerative agricultural systems.
View My Research
